attributes.action: Any non-UK national who commits a crime in the UK to be detained and deported
attributes.additional_details: We believe it will help deter illegal immigration and crime, particularly repeat offences.
attributes.background: We would like any non-UK national who commits a crime in the UK to be deported, and detained until deportation. If their country of origin cannot be determined they should be held indefinitely until it can be.
